title: McDonalds Fry Fest
articleDescription: Extra services to and from the Flemington Racecourse on Sunday 9 November 2025
articleContent:
Public transport for McDonalds Fry Fest at the Flemington Racecourse on Sunday 9 November.

The event will run from 2pm to 6pm.

Before you travel

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.
